sentences.english: Softly, deftly, music shall caress you…
sentences.chinese: 溫柔地，輕靈地，樂聲將把你撫慰。

sentences.english: The nimble gait and charming spirits could well be the best dance one can find.
sentences.chinese: 輕靈的舞姿，動人的神韻，是我們能發現的最好的。

sentences.english: I never let my valiant wings off your soft and fairy body.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠不會讓強健的翅膀與你柔軟輕靈的身軀分離。

sentences.english: March breeze, tempting lazy, elegant light and agile.
sentences.chinese: 三月的微風，繾綣慵懶，飄逸輕靈。

sentences.english: Ten and a quarter inches long, swishy, made of willow.
sentences.chinese: 十又四分之一英寸長，輕靈型，柳木。

sentences.english: More lightly go properly natural can absorb magic dent.
sentences.chinese: 更爲輕靈天然能吸收魔幻力。

sentences.english: I light and lively flutter to fly giant's front.
sentences.chinese: 我輕靈的飄飛而起，飛到巨人的面前。

sentences.english: I fled that ground as lightly as a feather.
sentences.chinese: 我逃離大地，輕靈如翎毛。

definition: a transition (stop and change) in spoken sound, music or in brush strokes/a cadence/punctuated by a transition/with syncopated cadence (brush stroke in painting)
lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
